name: Bromeliad
description:
In Bromeliad you are stranded in an pacific island were you are a Human-Bear. You transformed into a Human-Bear because of an mysterious unknown creature that gave you his strange venom, when after that a giant bear jumps on you and mutates into you.

You dont know what has happened, or where you are, or where your hunter team is. You have to survive gathering materials to build tools, bases/houses/castles, you will need to hunt for food, explore... but the only thing strange other than you being a mutant is that at night strange creatures crawls and sneaks over the island in search of you.

Features:
An incredible crafting system, to craft every tool/weapon... that you will need.
An insane building system, to build your dream base/house/castle...
Dense nature and biomes to explore
An incredible huge island
Animals to hunt, to grab food and for some action.
Enemies to protect yourself from, be careful out there
An open-world
Insane graphics, to inmerge into the world.
A detailed inventory system, to collect everything that you need.
And much more!

Your destiny is to survive and find an ancient element hidden in the island to be back to normal as a human, then you will be able to remember everything and go back home, but remember its not so easy to get there because your not alone.
